comments: This contract was sole-sourced.This contract contains one or more amendments, which includes the exercise of an option(s) that was part of the original contract.This contract is a multi-year contract.This is a notice of the restatement of Contract EP46632616 dated 2015-27/2016-31. The contract was misstated for incorrect end date and has been corrected to reflect the year 2021 instead of 2016.
